column4: Where is the best place to install binaries so that they are available to all users (assuming proper permissions)? /bin? /usr/bin? /usr/share? Is there a guide to what, where and why?
/usr/bin in my opinion, it's a user binary.
Thanks, do you know if there is a sort of rule as to what the /usr/share is vs. some of the other folders? My biggest learning curve with linux has been understanding the folder structure.
there is, it's called the FHS. => http://www.pathname.com/fhs/pub/fhs-2.3.html
